meanings.definition: A scrap or remainder of food
meanings.sent1: After dinner, there were orts of bread left on the plate.
meanings.sent2: The cat eagerly devoured the orts of fish that fell from the table.
meanings.sent3: The orts of cheese seemed to be playing hide and seek on the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The orts of meat were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The orts of soup were so tiny, they looked like little islands in the bowl.

meanings.sent1: She found orts of paper scattered across the desk.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist carefully collected the ancient orts of pottery.
meanings.sent3: The orts of broken glass sparkled in the sunlight like tiny diamonds.
meanings.sent4: The orts of fabric left behind were just enough to patch the hole.
meanings.sent5: The orts of wood were like puzzle pieces waiting to be put back together.

meanings.sent1: He only had orts of time to finish the task before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: The beggar gratefully accepted the orts of coins given by passersby.
meanings.sent3: The orts of sugar in the bowl were barely enough for a single cup of tea.
meanings.sent4: The orts of paint left in the can were insufficient to cover the entire wall.
meanings.sent5: The orts of laughter in the room faded away as the mood turned somber.
